website_summaries.verdict: These scented litter beads smell amazing and create no dust whatsoever, eliminating the possibility of tiny particles being carried out of the box.
pros: Strong, fresh fragrance effectively cuts litter box odors
Large beads are completely dust- and track-free
cons: Beads can get scooped along with waste
Fragrance might be too strong for sensitive kitties

customer_reviews.title: Strong sent helps override cat litter smell
customer_reviews.text: Just got this to try it since I've been looking for something to help get rid of cat litter smell. This works pretty good just sprinkled a few right on top of litter and helped with the bad smell already. I still use a plugin along with this cause the cat smell is always strong to my sensitive nose and I clean it out as soon as my cat uses it. I'm glad I have this to help, I'm going to continue to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Reader

customer_reviews.title: Turned the smelliest of turds in to fields of flowers
customer_reviews.text: We love our cat Pharaoh, but OMG his poops are bad, we've tried different foods, treats, litters (standard, breeze pellets, pine pellets etc) and nothing changed the pungent odor of his stanky butt brownies. We would clean his litter box daily but the rank aroma of his keester cakes would seep out of the spare room where his box is and contaminate the rest of the house. Whenever we'd have guests, the door would be shut and labeled "The Quarantine Zone", nobody dared to enter. These beads along with a litter box cover solved the problem, our house smells fresh and clean once again!
customer_reviews.author: SpoodleTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Effective but strong smelling
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, this stuff is potent and perfumey. My cat actually wouldnt use the box after I put these beads in. I have an automatic scooping box and shes okay with them being in the waste trap, so I still gave the product 4 stars because I believe they are helping. They work but picky cats may dislike them!
customer_reviews.author: DRS

customer_reviews.title: We love these
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome we have been using them for 6 months they smell amazing , the green one is our favorite scent . litter box does not smell bad anymore
customer_reviews.author: mandy87

customer_reviews.title: Very effective deodorizer
customer_reviews.text: The Hertz Fresh Scent is the best deodorizer I have ever found to neutralize the scent of the litter box. It is a bit pricey but there are several different scents and some are cheaper than others. They different scents can range by a difference of $6.00. I'm not sure why one scent would be more expensive than another but the product is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: CLW

customer_reviews.title: Gets the smell out
customer_reviews.text: Though these help with odor a lot. They unfortunately get scooped out when cleaning the litter box so you use them up very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very strong!
customer_reviews.text: These do exactly what you think they'll do - sometimes almost too well! They have a decent scent, but that scent can be overwhelmingly strong if you use too many beads. It says to use a capful of them, but I would use more like a half of a capful until you are used to how strong they are.
customer_reviews.author: Stumbleina

customer_reviews.title: Love these things!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. It doesn't take much to do the job. They smell great and start absorbing the bad smell right away. The cat just seemed to not even notice. I was worried she might not use the litter with them, but no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: I have 3 cats with 3 different litter box habits ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats with 3 different litter box habits and 1 cat that doesn't bury his business and he stinks everything up. These little scented pellets of heaven do work! I throw a handful in each box and any odor is gone. Of course it's not a replacement for scooping/ cleaning the boxes, but they make the boxes less stinky
customer_reviews.author: clever1

customer_reviews.title: You'll be sorry you bought them...
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: My cat hated these so much that she chose to pee ON MY BED rather than in her litterbox where I had just added these beads. I don't know if it was because of the scent or the strength of the smell. I removed them from her box immediately and replaced the litter, and it still took about 2 months of trying different things to figure out how to get her to use the box again!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't live without...
customer_reviews.text: I think they have their advertising all wrong. I don't use this in the litter... I use it in my Litter Genie and let me tell you, a little sprinkle makes a huge difference, when you lift the Litter Genie's lid. I scoop the poo into the Genie and when I have secured the poo. I open the Genie again, throw a few in and close the lid. It really made the whole Littler Genie experience for me... purrfect !
customer_reviews.author: J. Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Hardly noticable
customer_reviews.text: I've personally noticed no change. I can't even smell these, even though I sprinkled a generous amount into 3 side by side litter boxes. I'm going back to another brand's odor control pods, which smell fantastic and are effective in covering (maybe eliminating) the smell of cat urine.
customer_reviews.author: Dana H

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering. I've tried other scents. It really helps to deodorize the cat litter. I have 4 cats. I'll definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: JANET HILL

customer_reviews.title: Not good for scoopable litter
customer_reviews.text: I have two kinds of litter boxes (and seven stinky cats!), the regular scoopable litter and Tidy Cat Breeze (the kind that uses the pellets). When I used it in the regular litter the scent beads got scooped up with the litter. But they work great with the pellets! Makes a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: JoyDesigns

customer_reviews.title: Okay--could be way better
customer_reviews.text: A little strong smelling--and I like scent. It gives me a headache until it dies down a bit. The balls get stuck in the litter scoop, so that's not great. I also feel like the effectiveness wanes after a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: the_wordgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: These smell great! Only use a few, they're very strong. The cats don't mind them either. So far it's masked the litter smell when I neglect to change it. The price is awesome as well. After a few days I scoop them out though, because they lose smell and absorb the pee
customer_reviews.author: Kaley

customer_reviews.title: Great deoderizer
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty sure this product was discontinued. I use this in my breeze litter box because the regular powder just falls through I like that it helps with controlling the smell a bit
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Too much waste of the product
customer_reviews.text: These pellets do smell nice and help to keep odors down but with two cats I have to scoop daily. The pellets get scooped up along with the waste so not very economical. I have gone back to the old Arm and Hammer Litter Box deodorizer. It is a lot cheaper to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kraftylady

customer_reviews.title: Work well, although very large
customer_reviews.text: Work well, although my cats seem to hate the large pieces and kept scooping them out and then trying to eat them. That said, they are good and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: The smell of these was somewhat off puttinf. It almost accentuates the smell of cat urine instead of masking it. I would not purchase these again
customer_reviews.author: Lmnop48

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Freshening Product
customer_reviews.text: These beads are incredible! They can freshen a litter box amazingly well. We use them in 2 cat boxes and have never been disappointed. Would love to see the return of pink wildflower scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beads are too large for my use
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good about this product except the beads are too large. I use the crystal cat litter and the beads get scooped out with the kitty poop because they're too big to sift through.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: I use these with Breeze system to help with wet ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these with Breeze system to help with wet pellets. They work but it took my cat a few weeks to get use to them.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: A nice idea but..
customer_reviews.text: They smell nice but you'll end up throwing most away when you clean the litter box. I recommend scented baking soda instead.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Beads are too BIG
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, smells great...unfortunately the beads are TOO BIG. They get scooped up with everything else, so I'm having to replace them constantly when I shouldn't have to (or pick them out? ugh). Have looked around with a scoop with slots big enough to accommodate the beads...but nope.
customer_reviews.author: R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these litter deodorizing beads so much. They really help keep the odor levels down for my cat's litter box and are super easy to use. Just spring a capfull into the litter and they scoop right out with the waste.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Apples

customer_reviews.title: Best Litter Bead Smell I've Tried!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! The scent does not last very long, but it definitely replaces the odors immediately, and even when its scent goes away it still eliminates the litter smells.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Still recommend for short
customer_reviews.text: A little too strong smelling at first, but fades fairly fast. Still recommend for short term
customer_reviews.author: Talitha

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Not great. My cat didn't like it in the box and the scent didn't last more than a day really.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine anspaugh

customer_reviews.title: so it smells a lot these are wonderful haven't smelled her litter at all
customer_reviews.text: My cat uses the bathroom a lot, so it smells a lot these are wonderful haven't smelled her litter at all. I highly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Lashai Johnson

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I can't even tell I have a litter box in my house using these. Will definately buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tara C

customer_reviews.title: Very effective.
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't purchase things made by this company but these are an exception. They reduce odor and leave a light, fragrant odor in the air.
customer_reviews.author: Eames

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! It doesn't last as long as I want it, but it smells so good. It really helps with the oder elimination!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Ok for short term
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last as long as I thought smell would last.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. Potteiger

customer_reviews.title: Has no real use except for toy for cat to get all over
customer_reviews.text: Has a great sent out of the container, but does nothing in litter box. Doesn't break down doesn't absorb, just a bunch of green blobs in the box that the cat just wants to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin

customer_reviews.title: altho i do find myself scooping them out with the poo so not the best design since i throw them away every day
customer_reviews.text: helps with smell! altho i do find myself scooping them out with the poo so not the best design since i throw them away every day
customer_reviews.author: sarah marie

customer_reviews.title: not sure I noticed...
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this made a difference... and my cat did try to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: rainnnaturelover

customer_reviews.title: Clumping litter
customer_reviews.text: Whatever was I thinking? I have multiple cats and use clumping litter. I clean the boxes at least once a day. After I use the scoop--well DUH. All the beads are gone and I end up with no beads. If you have one cat this may work for you if you seldom scoop out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Makes litter smell good
customer_reviews.text: Really like the way it makes the litter smell. Can’t go without it now that I have found this product
customer_reviews.author: Kristi A. Earl

customer_reviews.title: waste of
customer_reviews.text: Didn't care for it, has large prices and gets scooped up with poo. Doesn't seem to have any deodorizing power. Won't buy again, waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Santoro

customer_reviews.title: Good deodorizer
customer_reviews.text: Works well to deodorize cat’s litter but does not last very long
customer_reviews.author: yae won

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for low dust!! It does take a lot to get an effect!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my 2 boy cats think this is amazing. I hate when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: Answer to stinky cat box ...... I have five Fur babies.... They like it too!
customer_reviews.author: Go Vikes

customer_reviews.title: What cat? Where?
customer_reviews.text: When I first added it to the litter box. The room smelled good. Every time my cat uses the litter box, I can hear him, but I don’t smell him. It’s a good product
customer_reviews.author: Diva n need

customer_reviews.title: awesome! works very well
customer_reviews.text: awesome! works very well. I have to change litter much less frequently now and there is no odor at all. even ascooped litter has an odor usually but these beads keep it smelling fresh.
customer_reviews.author: A N

customer_reviews.title: Litter Odor Control
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be very effective, using a minimal quantity. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA SACHETTA

customer_reviews.title: Gone too fast
customer_reviews.text: They smell great, but get scooped up when cleaning the box, so they are gone fast.
customer_reviews.author: Richard and Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell
customer_reviews.text: Really helps mask the urine small from my litter box without being overpowering - and the cats don't seem to mind it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is completely useless. The scent goes away after half an hour and of course when the litter box gets cleaned out the pellets do as well. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Diane Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: They definitely smell nice, but as far as masking the odor— it didn’t do much at all. Even as my kitten moved the litter around to “mix” the deodorizers in as she used it. And they remain clumped together, so when you scoop the litter, they come out as well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Dont work
customer_reviews.text: Super strong smell and still dont help the litterbox smell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don’t smell and all you do is scoop them up when you clean litter box
customer_reviews.author: janelle hicks

customer_reviews.title: Stuff works
customer_reviews.text: We can stand to be in the same room as the cat when she decides to go. This stuff works. Not to strong. Just add a few pellets and it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of these, really helps with cat odors.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Dox

customer_reviews.title: kill they cat oder
customer_reviews.text: very good on keeping the scent fresh. i highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: killerkelly

customer_reviews.title: these are great and really work
customer_reviews.text: If you use unscented litter, these are great and really work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic - I use them with pellets and even further extends their use!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These fresh scents for the cat litter are the best! They work so good!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice for about an hour after you sprinkle it on. Then, nothing. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Strong, fresh scent but not overpowering. Works well ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong, fresh scent but not overpowering. Works well, especially after they are added to the litter box. The cats don't seem to mind the scent and have not had an issue using the litter box with these beads added.
customer_reviews.author: Jwil

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: These dont break up. They dont release scent. Ill stick with powders.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: at first its strong but fades nicely. I like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent smell and covering of smell from the litter box. I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Anna R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best litter box deodorizers that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: KBL

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent!
customer_reviews.text: Strong smell! Gave me a headache. I'm sensative to smells tho!
customer_reviews.author: mh1981

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just a little worked for one week-until the litter was changed
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very effective. Just a few in a litter is enough.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: This stuff has a great smell, after cleaning out the box I just ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has a great smell, after cleaning out the box I just sprinkle a few in with the litter, wow smells so much better
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Gray

customer_reviews.title: Please keep making
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Very sad to hear Hartz will stop production.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Willey

customer_reviews.title: Prize is good.
customer_reviews.text: Prize is good. I do think keeps smell down from the cats. Less costly than Walmart and other stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: No scent and I use it with the breeze litter system and a regular litter box with pine litter
customer_reviews.author: AmazBooklover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. A little goes a longways.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some what strong at first but scent didn't seem to last. Delivery was lightening fast!!
customer_reviews.author: vanessa sullens

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant litter beads
customer_reviews.text: Best product of its type that I have used.Pleasing scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Too strong smelling!! I found my cat sleeping in her litter box. After I got her out she was meowing at absolutely nothing, crying and scared. I had to hold her so she felt secure, the smell made her too weak to get out of her litter box and she acted very weird. Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A MUST-HAVE FOR CAT OWNERS
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute best. We sprinkle some into each of the litter boxes every time we change, and we never EVER smell the litter box! I don't know how they work, all I know is that they DO! We once ran out, and could smell the litter box for the first time in a long time. Let's just say we got some ASAP! They have a lifetime customer here, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Zerr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, but you can find elsewhere for 1/3 the price.
customer_reviews.author: David Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these because they sounded perfect with great reviews. They smell great when you first open and sprinkle them in, but after that, it doesn't really control odor or even smell like its covering up the odors. I've noticed no difference since using and I'm almost out of the first tube. I would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jessina

customer_reviews.title: ... and hammer carpet powder I feel that works the best.
customer_reviews.text: Okay so far I also use arm and hammer carpet powder I feel that works the best.
customer_reviews.author: Antony J Hernandez

product_meta.title: Hartz Fresh Scent Deodorizing Litter Beads - Spring Meadow
product_meta.description: HARTZ Fresh Scent Deodorizing Litter Beads - Spring Meadow
feature_bullets: Continuous freshness beyond the litter box.
Simply sprinkle over your favorite litter to eliminate odors.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
